Initial Rating Activity Action Proposing a Reduction in a Disability Evaluation
The rating activity prepares a rating decision proposing changes in the evaluation(s) assigned to SC disabilities that will result in a reduction or discontinuance of benefits.Â  This rating decision
cites all the material facts and justification for the proposed action, and
provides the beneficiary with the proposed
evaluation(s) of the disability(ies) in question, and
combined evaluation, if applicable.
